**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 28 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 26 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 23 [Cyclops Bully](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1690) **Source** [Pathfinder #171: Hurricane's Howl](/Sources.aspx?ID=101) pg. 48 **Perception** +17; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=23) **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Cyclops](/Languages.aspx?ID=30), [Jotun](/Languages.aspx?ID=8) **Skills** [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +19, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +18, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +17 **Str** +6 **Dex** +0 **Con** +4 **Int** -1 **Wis** +4 **Cha** +3 **Items** [Greatclub](/Weapons.aspx?ID=22), [Hide Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=7) --- **AC** 28 **Fort** +21 **Ref** +15 **Will** +17 **HP** 155 **Brutal Recovery** ([divination](/Traits.aspx?ID=47), [fortune](/Traits.aspx?ID=76), [occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120)) **Frequency** once per day; **Trigger** The cyclops bully fails (but does not critically fail) an attack roll or an [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) check; **Effect** The cyclops bully forces its will on an array of possible futures. It gets a success on the roll instead of a failure.
**[Ferocity](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=16)** --- **Speed** 30 feet **Melee** greatclub +21 ([Backswing](/Traits.aspx?ID=173), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192), [Shove](/Traits.aspx?ID=193)), **Damage** 2d10+10 bludgeoning **Melee** fist +21 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199)), **Damage** 2d6+10 bludgeoning **Terrorizing Swing** The cyclops bully attempts to [Demoralize](/Actions.aspx?ID=53) a foe within its melee reach, then makes a melee Strike against that foe. If the creature is [frightened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19) and takes damage, it takes an additional 2d10 damage and is knocked [prone](/Conditions.aspx?ID=31). This counts as two attacks toward the cyclops's multiple attack penalty
